page.title: 17Leisure and Recreation
page.content: {LEISURE AND RECREATIONAL ACTIVITIES {IN STORRINGTON Currently over 60 clubs and organisations are ensuring a great variety of activities are available in the Storrington area. There are pre-school playgroups and ballet,tap and modern dance classes at the Village Hall. The Church Halls provide lively clubs for the youngsters as well as Sunday Schools, and the Brownies, Cubs,Guides and Scouts are well established in the area. For the teenagers the A.T.C., the Vipers Football Club, Priory Boxing Club and the Rydon Community School Youth Wing give vent to excess energy in a social environment. The rolling Downs offer superb facilities for several riding stables.For adults there are clubs catering for interests such s Scottish Dancing, Bingo, Bridge, Bell-ringing,
